title: I was unjustly banned, my states League Of Legends Tournament is in 2 days and im crying please help
body:
Ive posted this in multiple boards for more help...please im begging
I was just banned for quite literally such a stupid reason, chat logs and im balling my eyes out, sorry if text is badn I can barely see. I was playing with a friend of mine and I was practicing jungle my role and got tilted at my trolling inting laners and out of no where im banned...please for the love of god look at the chat logs is this taht bad...
Game 1
In-Game
Exp3ctations: lvl 2 gank top
Exp3ctations: well
Exp3ctations: dude?
Exp3ctations: how?
Exp3ctations: can any lane win?
Exp3ctations: outplaayed
Exp3ctations: YAS
Exp3ctations: FREE KILL
Exp3ctations: you let me die btw
Exp3ctations: that death is on you
Exp3ctations: ysa can you stay in lane
Exp3ctations: please
Exp3ctations: mp
Exp3ctations: no
Exp3ctations: yeah
Exp3ctations: yes
Exp3ctations: yas please man
Exp3ctations: DUD
Exp3ctations: STOP CHAISNMHG
Exp3ctations: LMAO
Exp3ctations: WHEN YOURE THE ONE WHOSE INTING
Exp3ctations: REALLYU
Exp3ctations: FUK YOI
Exp3ctations: boosted yasuo gg
Exp3ctations: No he doesnt
Exp3ctations: its teh other way around
Exp3ctations: BOOSTED YASUO CNAT EVEN LAND Qs
Exp3ctations: can we ff
Exp3ctations: he fukked this game
Exp3ctations: BECAUSE IT SHOULDNT HAPPEN IN RANKED AT ALL
Exp3ctations: can we afkl
Exp3ctations: please
Exp3ctations: we lost
Exp3ctations: Let me and I quote yasuo let me conentrate
Exp3ctations: LMAO THAN WHY DID I KILL YOU GUYS SO MANY TIMES
Exp3ctations: boosted yas
Exp3ctations: Strikes again
Exp3ctations: no you arent
Exp3ctations: otherwise you wouldve stopped
Exp3ctations: lmao im the toxic when when you said come help me mid you tard
Exp3ctations: love league honestly
Exp3ctations: open mid
Exp3ctations: than why do I have less deaths and more kills
Exp3ctations: for what playing the game
Exp3ctations: lmao so fair this game
Exp3ctations: btw live on Twitch.tv/Expect
Exp3ctations: /Exp3ct
Exp3ctations: all the inting glory on here
Exp3ctations: sending the clips to riot support
Exp3ctations: 4
Exp3ctations: dead again
Exp3ctations: it was gg at 5 minutes
Post-Game
Exp3ctations: well gg
Exp3ctations: come watch the vod on my twitch
Exp3ctations: sending to rito soon btw
Game 2
Pre-Game
Exp3ctations: ????
In-Game
Exp3ctations: why do you have to troll bot
Exp3ctations: it better be
Exp3ctations: im gonna be pissed thats about all
Exp3ctations: yeah but ezreal coulda just went support
Exp3ctations: okay
Exp3ctations: win lane then :)
Exp3ctations: lol
Exp3ctations: my b
Exp3ctations: DUDE
Exp3ctations: PLEASE
Exp3ctations: Yorick
Exp3ctations: please land skillshots
Exp3ctations: 2 adcs is a good botlane guys
Exp3ctations: 2 ADcS iS a GooD BotLaNe
Exp3ctations: THAN SIT UNDER TURRET
Exp3ctations: imagine if you had a soraka with silence and a heal????
Exp3ctations: gg no bot lane
Exp3ctations: Mf CouNteRs ZyRa
Exp3ctations: holy fuk thanks for feeding him yorick
Exp3ctations: do you not see the three assists
Exp3ctations: for a jungler thats 3 kills
Exp3ctations: omg youre Support is 0 adn 4
Exp3ctations: Theres your kill chief
Exp3ctations: so one of our main sources of damage doesnt have a single item yet
Exp3ctations: still a smart support pick
Exp3ctations: dor wanting to win and you troll me?
Exp3ctations: I got mid the first kill of the game what do you mean
Exp3ctations: and I ganked you twice just so you could die to a nasus a level belowyou
Exp3ctations: do oy
Exp3ctations: now'
Exp3ctations: YORICK
Exp3ctations: DO SOMETHING USEFUL
Exp3ctations: in team fights i mean
Exp3ctations: CC the akali
Exp3ctations: gj on turrets
Exp3ctations: honestly
Exp3ctations: BOP
Exp3ctations: |GG
Post-Game
Exp3ctations: gg
Exp3ctations: LMAO
Exp3ctations: ELECTROCUTE YI
Exp3ctations: BOOSTED RUINS
honestly...im scared please boards or ANTYONE help me I need to help my team and im crying sooo hard right now...and im sorry I was mad...is this fair....

replies.body: don't type as it just ends in a ban for someone like you
someone like me...what does that even mean im a good person I had 2 bad games and I WON ONE OF THEM EVEN please how is this justified

It's not just these 2 games though right?  You admitted to having 14-days ban some 2 months ago so you were bad in those games before that.  Either you were being extremely toxic to get escalater to 14-days straight or you came from a 25 chat restrictions.  Which means you were toxic in many games before the 14-days on top of these 2 games.  Then to get 25 CR, you would also have to be toxic in many games to earn a 10 CR.  So you were toxic in many games before the 25 CR on top of many games before the 14-day on top of these games to finally arrived at the perma.  Don't cry unjust because it is not just these 2 games that ruined your dream.

That's A LOT of games to be toxic in for a good person.  You can't say you don't see a perma coming after 3 separate punishments (or one extremely toxic punishment for a good person).

If I landed a dream job at a company, I sure as hell not going to fuck around with their product/service AFTER being warned 3 times that they do not want my behaviors in their product/service.  I sure am will not cry foul or unjust if I ignored the warnings.

> [{quoted}](name=Exp3ctations,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=hqANQREn,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2019-04-10T06:04:55.543+0000)
>
> someone like me...what does that even mean im a good person I had 2 bad games and I WON ONE OF THEM EVEN please how is this justified

i'm semi toxic but i just play it out but then again i don't give a shit if someone is feeding better team wins {{champion:29}}

There's a lot of harassment and passive aggressive negativity in those logs.

When was your previous punishment and what was it?
a 14 day chat ban suspension about 2 months ago...I even made it to the second stage of honor level 0
Then the ban is justified. The 2week ban is your last warning, just like it says in the notification you probably ignored. Sorry!
I READ IT I SWEAR TO GOD...this is my first time in months of ever being mad and this is sooo depressing for me is there nothing I can doo...
You can always try your luck with support but with that log, I wouldn't get my hopes up.
I contacted and am waiting for a reply god im so stressed out

Oh no, no it's not your first time doing what you do. It's not about you being mad - you spend entire games telling everyone what to do, pointing out every mistake, and being belligerent as all hell. You aren't in charge, you aren't the team captain, and you need to focus on yourself, not everyone else.

> [{quoted}](name=Exp3ctations,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=hqANQREn,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2019-04-10T05:48:26.168+0000)
>
> I READ IT I SWEAR TO GOD...this is my first time in months of ever being mad and this is sooo depressing for me is there nothing I can doo...

: 
^
)

It's even worse that you read it and still chose to. No pity for you. Sorry.

There's some important things about this situation that you are not understanding.

>NO ONE DOES THAT IN ORGANIZED PLAY I have no issues In organized play at all

Let me tell you about organized play.  Sport organizations have rules, many of them are about individuals and their actions.  This is not uncommon, they both can and will give out fines and suspensions to players for many things, including arguing, insulting, or mocking others.  An example is when a football player made a suggestive gesture lasting maybe a half of a second and was given a $10,000 fine for it.  Compare that half second to yours which includes all of the above.

You have received multiple, written warnings **directly from the official organization of this sport** about your history of actions in the game, telling you to cease your behavior but you chose to ignore those and continued.    Because of that, you got a suspension, again directly from the sports organizer. A suspension, your 3rd strike and a message telling you there will be no more of this and that if your violation the rules of the sport happens again, you will be permanently banned.  

What did you choose to do?

> [{quoted}](name=Exp3ctations,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=hqANQREn,comment-id=000100000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-04-10T06:18:15.949+0000)
>
> I CANT PLAY my account is registered on the roster. This is literally the first time ive been toxic in MONTHS. Youre telling me someone ruining my game is justification to ruin one of the best chances ill ever have in my life? Really? Really? Ruining a persons dreams over some ill intented words is worth my fukking dream?

There's no shortage of stories about young, up and coming sports players who were poised to have bright careers and successful lives, but decided to throw it all away over some trivial nonsense.  And there's nothing for them because of that, only an incident that creates yet another example where a lack of responsibility had them squander everything they had going for them.

All that's left is to count yourself lucky that your first life lesson about this is so painless as a League tournament.

> After reading all these replies by youre logic all of you should be banned as well have fun making fun of someone who has been given depression <3

They are not making fun of you, they just tell you that your ban was justified.
And can everyone stop saying "hurr durr depressions" when they don't feel well for a day or two or use it as an excuse for everything?
There are people like me and close friends of mine who suffer from this and other shit, this behaviour is just disrespectful.

Any school competition has standards for behavior.  If you don't learn self control during practice, you're going to do the same thing during competition and make your school and team look bad.

It's no different than traditional sports.  Athletes who break the rules can miss out when it matters.

This wasn't in a school regulated match it was a ranked game my Yas was name calling me and calling me r%%%%%ed while inting NO ONE DOES THAT IN ORGANIZED PLAY I have no issues In organized play at all

> [{quoted}](name=Exp3ctations,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=hqANQREn,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2019-04-10T06:10:13.074+0000)
>
> This wasn't in a school regulated match it was a ranked game my Yas was name calling me and calling me r%%%%%ed while inting NO ONE DOES THAT IN ORGANIZED PLAY I have no issues In organized play at all

I understand it was not in an organized game.  But think of it as going to a community center or gym to play basketball.  It might be just a pickup game with a bunch of random people who also happen to be playing at that time, but you are still expected to follow the facility rules.

My advice, as someone who played varsity sports in high school, is to focus on the game, and focus on yourself.  If someone is harrassing you, mute them. It's not worth risking your account because someone else is in a pissy mood.  If someone is trolling, find something to practice:  warding, farming under pressure, etc.

Another bit of advice is to look for reasons to compliment your teammates.  Tell them thank you for that level one jungle leash.  Give a thumbs up if they set up a good gank for you.  Shifting focus like that will help you stay calmer, and it'll give your teammates more incentive to help you out and less reason to flame you.

This was a justified ban.
Sorry, you're going to have to move on. 

This game is probably isn't for you if you can't handle your emotions.
So me being mad is worth me losing 100$ worth of riot points and a chance to help my school? hwo is this fair

Yes, it's fair because you agreed to these terms before you even downloaded this game.
Always read the [Terms of Use](https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/legal/termsofuse) for every game before you agree to sign them. 
Otherwise, you would never be in this situation.
I know not to be toxic im not a toxic person I was being called r%%%%%ed by my yasuo as he ruined this game for me im not a bad person I just want to play the game THATS LITERALLY ALL I WNAT

It's not about being a good or bad person, it's about not typing back with ill intent or anger.
Doesn't matter what they call you, the only thing you should have done was mute and play the game. 

You can still play, you just have to make another account if you're permabanned.

I CANT PLAY my account is registered on the roster. This is literally the first time ive been toxic in MONTHS. Youre telling me someone ruining my game is justification to ruin one of the best chances ill ever have in my life? Really? Really? Ruining a persons dreams over some ill intented words is worth my fukking dream?

> [{quoted}](name=Exp3ctations,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=hqANQREn,comment-id=000100000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-04-10T06:18:15.949+0000)
>
> Youre telling me someone ruining my game is justification to ruin one of the best chances ill ever have in my life? 

You ruined it all by yourself. No "he started it", no "he called me this and that" - you decided to behave like that. And especially when you know that your account is on thin ice and such a great opportunity is coming for you you should have pulled yourself together.
So youre telling me I cant be human and I cant be a teenager with a dream and that second chances dont exist. Guess people who play this game truly have no soul...

You can be as human as you want - and another awesome thing humans are able to is to control their behaviour in this game. We are not IRL where your face/body-language shows the other person how you feel even when you decide to stay silent. Scream at the PC, question your players, hell even if you want throw insults around - the thing is keep these actions private and don't type it in the chat. 

Just because you are young doesn't mean that you can be excused from the consequences. And you had a second chance as the account was not permanent banned for your first punishment. Either 3, 2 or 1 chance(s) depending on how toxic you have been before.

I find it adorable that you say that I have no soul. Guess what, I am a teenager by myself and human! But  I know that following your dreams is  important and that you have to respect/follow certain guidelines/rules to achieve them. 

You wanna go into politics? Awesome! Then you care for your image. You wanna go into a special private-school? Awesome! Then you care for your grades and your representation. 
And you wanna participate in tournaments? Awesome! Then you try staying clean and not get in trouble with the registered account.

>So youre telling me I cant be human 

humans make mistakes which they pay for so you're in the grid

>and I cant be a teenager with a dream 

i suggest protecting your dream better in the future

>and that second chances dont exist. 

riot gives players between 1 and 3 chances to redeem themselves. regardless if the two week ban was your only punishment on the account or not, **you already had a second chance, which you chose to ignore**.

>Guess people who play this game truly have no soul...

i'm confused

are you saying you have no soul?

Nope, you had a responsibility, and you neglected that responsibility.
It doesn't take much to just mute someone. You just chose not to.

What you do mean second chances don't exist?  You had a 14-day ban.  THAT was your second chance (or if you are not an extremely toxic person, then that was your FOURTH chance).

You can be a human and a teenager with a dream.  You can also be a person with responsibility and accountability.  League has millions of player base.  To generalize MILLIONS of people (who play this game) have no soul is kind of toxic no?
take some responsibility ffs

> [{quoted}](name=Exp3ctations,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=hqANQREn,comment-id=000100000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-04-10T06:18:15.949+0000)
>
> I CANT PLAY my account is registered on the roster. This is literally the first time ive been toxic in MONTHS. Youre telling me someone ruining my game is justification to ruin one of the best chances ill ever have in my life? Really? Really? Ruining a persons dreams over some ill intented words is worth my fukking dream?

Dude have you seen toxicity in the pro scene? You won't last if you can tilt like that

Create a new account or go talk to your coach/rep. Explain thay there has been an issue with your account and it isn't usable. Usually there are rules/guidelines in place for those typenof situations.
Unjust? You 100% earned it.
tell me where? please

> [{quoted}](name=Exp3ctations,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=hqANQREn,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2019-04-10T06:06:04.561+0000)
>
> tell me where? please

Um... everywhere? You constantly scream, swear at your teammates, give up, call your teammates "boosted," insist that you're going to report them, call your teammates "trolls," scream _constantly_...

Riot tells suspended players that their next punishment will be a permaban, and it can happen if they demonstrate anything less than excellent behavior. However, it's clear that you have absolutely no conception of what good or bad behavior look like. Well, let me tell you: your behavior was very bad. You definitely deserved your ban. No tournament for you.
I mean from what I could see on stream, I can fully understand why you would get banned for this behavior.

yeah... for anyone having doubts about the ban being just, the game recorded on his stream is pretty self explanatory on what the problem was in that game. and it wasn't just the {{champion:157}}'s trolling
After reading all these replies by youre logic all of you should be banned as well have fun making fun of someone who has been given depression <3

> [{quoted}](name=Bettnachleger,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=hqANQREn,comment-id=00050002,timestamp=2019-04-11T02:39:47.004+0000)
>
> lol you little Punk who cries about a fucking videogame account has no idea about depressions.
> Or the loss of something that's **really ** important in your life.
> I mean ... you have friends and a family. 
> That shit is important ... not a fucking free2play videogame.

Keeping things in perspective is good, but you don't need to be insulting about it.

lol do you know the feeling of depression?
Do you know how shitty it feels when people you love pass away?

Seriously, I hate Punks like the TE who use "depressions" or what ever just because "memememme I'm a victicm of the system and everything is soooo hard ahhhhhh pls no ban mimimimi" as an excuse.

I suffer from depression along as time now and jeah ... my best friend just passed away a half a year ago. 
Do you see me going around in video games and flame people?
Nope.
It's a dumb ass cheap excuse and people who really suffer don't get the attention they need.

> [{quoted}](name=Bettnachleger,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=hqANQREn,comment-id=0005000200000000,timestamp=2019-04-11T06:04:01.115+0000)
>
> lol do you know the feeling of depression?
> Do you know how shitty it feels when people you love pass away?
> 
> Seriously, I hate Punks like the TE who use "depressions" or what ever just because "memememme I'm a victicm of the system and everything is soooo hard ahhhhhh pls no ban mimimimi" as an excuse.
> 
> I suffer from depression along as time now and jeah ... my best friend just passed away a half a year ago. 
> Do you see me going around in video games and flame people?
> Nope.
> It's a dumb ass cheap excuse and people who really suffer don't get the attention they need.

Yeah, actually, I do.  My best friend in high school was in and out of care for depression and attempted suicide.  Another kid from my high school died only a couple months before graduating.  I also worked at a hospital for a few years where depression and other mental illness were not uncommon.

Still doesn't mean the op deserves to be insulted.

He for sure deserves it. 
Using a fucking illness as an excuse?
Sir, you get what you asked for ...

Btw. I feel sorry for you. I hope you're fine.
we didn't make fun of you. we told you why you're wrong. there's a difference.

Why should we have been banned? Beside the fact that the boards have another set of rules which we have to follow than those in LoL. 

Nobody made fun of you. And has been given depression? You had a real depression before your ban or after the ban? Still mental-illnesses don't excuse trying to avoid criticism and/or facing the facts.
stick to your day job. this game isnt for you.
100% justified ban

This is nothing I got suspended for security reasons for using vpn
They will not unlock even after giving all the info
